page.text: The slot on this column contains an amulet now tightly clasped by its ancient mechanisms, it'd be devilishly tricky to remove it.
This column has a slot in the center of it for something to be inserted into and an encompassing empty circle inscribed above it.
The amulet settles into the slot a moment when you insert it but then pops free, maybe you did something wrong?

choice.text: curse these ancient ruins and their bewildering mechanisms!

page.text: You insert the amulet and it makes a clicking sound as it settles into the slot snugly.
